str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
(Hebrew), Isaac, the patriarch. Of Hebrew origin; Isaac, the son of Abraham.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.
A promise. From epaggello; an announcement.
